channel.title: [SFoL] 52 Clash Of Cults - The Blue Dragon are Victorious!
channel.description:
*Peace is always fleeting*.
Adiart had known a good many moons of relative stability, since the Black Rose Face-off that brought all the Unseen into Exile. After the Mastermind was beheaded, the Cult became more docile picking up more normal lives, living between the regular townsfolk becoming more akin to them. They win major points that way under the regime of the Blue Dragon. They were not so different after all. Only minor disagreements about the intricacies of lynching or ritualistic blood sacrifice. Potato, Potato.
Even the Neutrals no longer had much beef left. The Fool became sane under the new scarcity of lynches feeling solace into the sweet embrace of death suiciding. The Sellsword became enchanted with the devotion of the Mercenary, after which they made a contract of their own avowing themselves into matrimony and consequently going on honeymoon. This didn't sit well with the Scorned, who made it their mission to see their happiness ruined. The Inquisitor can't handle the sheer Heatheny up in here and just yeetted themselves away for this match after killing the Warlock, because they are hella petty and they openly claimed it. The Neutral Killers had a massive showdown that resulted in their mutual demise. The Alchemist committed suicide after all evils had gone soft and they could no longer be near the agony of patients in excruciating pain.
All was well in Adiart until this one fateful night.
*The Mystic was twisting and turning. Hot flashes burned through their skull. Screams, conflict, an argument. They could faintly make out a table... no an altar because of twin torches lit atop of it. Two hooded personas were circling it. A distinct metallic odor, the smell of blood, crept up. "How cou", "Traitor, "You brought". A hard thud deafened the Mystic's hearing and their vision faded to black.*
*After coming to, they noticed more hooded figures entering the small decrepit area, among which a strong maternal energy. The Devout took off their hood revealing many scars, reached over for a small note lying near the carnage and with their face hardening read the jotting. With trembling hands they crumbled the note holding aback tears. The hooded figures started emotionally roaring. This meant war.*
[details="The Note"] ![image|388x500](upload://t41Cvi9W5sb1usTDJT4gElzexoL.png) [/details]
*The Mystic awoke in a cold sweat. They must warn the King and Kingdom of what they had seen. In the middle of the night they climbed step after step of the longwinding stairs seeing thunderous rainstorms through the circular windows. They reached the Royal Quarters and stormed past the guards straight into the throne room. It was vacant. While panting they surveyed the area and in the distance heard a wailing woman and crying. Was this the destined night?*
*The Mystic made their way over to the noises that suddenly had gone quiet and they barge into the Queen's private Chambers. There was blood everywhere. The Queen palely laid out in the bed completely out of sorts and not moving. Their eyes were hemorrhaging. The King held a small still baby in their arms. They hadn't opened their eyes and did not seem like they were going to. What calamity had happened here? The King slowly rose and said in a low otherworldly tone: "Gather the Court!"*
*Peace is always fleeting*.
----
# General Gameplay Information Host is Solic Co-host is Geyde
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum game for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Day 1 lasts 24 hours and will not have an execution. * Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the host. * This game features multiball with classic FoL cult points Mithras versus new ToL inspired Corax versus Blue Dragon. This means Mithras Cult can use cult points for abilities and Corax Cult cannot. * Neutrals, Sheriff and Unseen cannot spawn. * Cults will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * If both Cult Leaders try to convert the same player, the Mithras Cult has priority. * Neither Cult can convert the other Cult and they will get the same feedback as hitting a convert immune. * Both cults show up as the general cult upon faction check. * The Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * The Priest and Mystic may both spawn this match. * Mystic is not guaranteed to spawn as the lore might suggest.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 24 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. Journals are limited by 1000 characters.
## Classlist **King** **(60% <font color="steblue">Good</font>, 20% <font color="crimson">Corax Devout</font>, 20% <font color="orangered">Mithras Devout</font>)** <font color="crimson">**Corax Cult Leader**</font> <font color="crimson">**Random Corax Cult**</font> <font color="orangered">**Mithras Cult Leader**</font> <font color="orangered">**Random Mithras Cult**</font> <font color="steblue">**Prince**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font>
## [Classes](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
[details="Corax Classes"]
># [color=crimson]The Corax Acolyte :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color=crimson]**Cult Killer**[/color] > **Hemorrhage (Day)** - Invoke Corax’ will to cause a target to start bleeding uncontrollably. They will bleed and die in two nights if not healed. - 1 use :crown: **Blood Barrier (Day)** - Create a wall of blood to protect yourself and target cult from attacks. You will both be death immune this night. - 2 uses >**Curse of Corax(Night)** - If the target is bled tomorrow, they will die in 1 night instead of 2 nights. - 1 use :crown: **Sacrilege (Night)** - If the Cult Leader’s conversion fails or they use Eradicate, you will shoot their target(s) for them instead. Does not count as a visit. - 2 uses >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
----
> # [color=crimson]The Corax Apostle[/color] :crossed_swords: > > > **[color=crimson]Cult Social[/color]** **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Transcendence (Passive)** - Dead Cult will be able to talk in Cult chat as long as you are alive. **Baleful Hush (Day)** - Anonymously send a single 1000 character message through the host to a player. - 2 uses **Corrupt Minds (Day)** - Select two players that will have a private night chat for this night. Can select yourself. You will be privy to the chat at the end of the night. Can be used alongside Baleful Hush. - 2 uses >**Corax' Influence (Night)** - In the coming day, your target will require one less vote to be executed. - 1 use **Corax' Puppetry (Night)** - Use target dead Blue Dragon Non-Killer’s infinite use ability on an alive player. You will only be seen visiting the alive one. - 2 uses >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
---
># [color=crimson]The Corax Cult Leader[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=crimson]**Cult Special**[/color] **Rupture (Day)** - Cause a player to bleed. They will bleed and die in two nights if not healed. - 1 use :crown: **Blood of Corax (Day)** - Sacrifice yourself this night and flip as class of your choice. Other Cult members gain 1 use of all their limited use abilities. This occurs before promotion. - 1 use **Brainwash (Night)** - Change target player into the Cult version of their class. If you have failed to convert a target twice already and your next conversion would fail it will instead target a random convertible player. - Infinite uses, 1 night cooldown **Eradicate (Night)** - Unleash ancient power within Corax, attacking 2 target players at once. This ability will be seen visiting the first target only. - 2 uses :crown: >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
---
># [color=crimson]The Corax Devout King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=crimson]**Cult Special**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two if there are more than 5 players alive except during Grand Trial. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Dark Gods Crown (Night)** - Select a dead Corax Cultist and a living player. Depending on the Cultist's class a different effect will occur. Each corpse can only be used once. :crown: >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
>**Dark Gods Crown Effects:** Corax Seeker - You learn of the players class type. Corax Ritualist - You will prevent visits to the player. Corax Invoker - The player will be occupied. Corax Apostle - The player will be given incorrect feedback for their ability tonight. Corax Acolyte - The player will be unable to be healed for the night. Corax Cult Leader - The player will be framed. Corax Devout King - The player will be bled sometime during the next day.
---
># [color=crimson]The Corax Invoker[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=crimson]**Cult Offensive**[/color] **Fanatic (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Bewilder (Day)** - Target player is occupied for this day. - 1 Use **Chains of Corax (Night)** - Occupy a player. - 2 uses **Sanguine Strings (Night)** - Control a player into targeting another. You will only be seen visiting the controlled player. - 2 uses >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
-----------
># [color=crimson]The Corax Ritualist[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=crimson]**Cult Support**[/color] >**Brotherhood (Day)** - Make a Cult Member appear as selected BD class to investigations this night. - 2 uses >**Blood Ward (Day)** - Prevent anyone else from visiting your target this night. - 1 use :crown: >**Strength Of Corax (Night)** - The Cult Leader's Eradicate will bypass night immunity and healing tonight. - 1 use >**Corax' Mercy (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and curing any poison and bleeding they were suffering from. Can target self. - 3 uses :crown: >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
-------
># [color=crimson]The Corax Seeker[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=crimson]**Cult Investigative**[/color] **Expose (Day)** - Reveal who the prince jailed at the start of the night. - 1 use **Corax Murmurs (Day)** - Frame target player this night. - 2 Uses. **Gaze (Night)** - Learn a player's class type. - 2 uses **Identify (Night)** - Discover who a player visits, and who visits them. - 2 uses >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Mithras Cult._
-----
[/details]
[details="Mithras Base Classes"]
># [color=orangered]The Mithras Acolyte :crossed_swords: [/color] > [color=orangered]**Cult Killer**[/color] >**Spirit of Mithras (Passive)** - Starting with the second use of the Cult Leader’s Blood of Mithras, if you would be sacrificed, the first time you will not die. >**Curse of Mithras (Night)** - If the target is bled tomorrow, they will die in 1 night instead of 2 nights. - 1 use :crown: >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
----
> # [color=orangered]The Mithras Apostle[/color] :crossed_swords: > **[color=orangered]Cult Social[/color]** > **Eminence of Mithras (Day)** - During a king election, your vote counts as two. Stacks with Royal Blood to 3 votes maximum. - 2 uses >**Mithras' Influence (Night)** - In the coming day, your target will require one less vote to be executed. - 1 use >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
---
># [color=orangered]The Mithras Cult Leader[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=orangered]**Cult Special**[/color] **Train (Passive)** - At any point before the start of the first night, you may message the host and choose the Cult alts that the Cult class that spawned with you will receive, based on a non-unique class they can be converted from. If you do not choose the Cult alts, they will receive a random valid set. **Fanaticism (Passive)** - You are immune to death at night until you successfully convert a player, where upon this passive is disabled. (Starting Cult Leader only) **Disguise (Day)** - If the target player dies tonight, they will appear as a class of your choice. - 1 use (shared) :crown: **Rupture (Day)** - Cause a player to bleed. They will bleed and die in two nights if not healed. - 3 uses (shared) :crown: **Brainwash (Night)** - Change target player into the Cult version of their class. If you have failed to convert a target twice already and your next conversion would fail it will instead target a random convertible player. - Infinite uses, 1 night cooldown **Blood of Mithras (Night)** - Kill a Cult player and a non-Cult player. The first use of this will not kill the cult player. This ability does not visit the Cult player. - Infinite uses :crown: >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
---
># [color=orangered]The Mithras Devout King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=orangered]**Cult Special**[/color] **Pass the Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two if there are more than 5 players alive except during Grand Trial. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses :crown: **Dark Gods Crown (Night)** - Select a dead Mithras Cultist and a living player. Depending on the Cultist's class a different effect will occur. Each corpse can only be used once. :crown: >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
>**Dark Gods Crown Effects:** Mithras Seeker - You learn of the players class type. Mithras Ritualist - You will prevent visits to the player. Mithras Invoker - The player will be occupied. Mithras Apostle - The player will be given incorrect feedback for their ability tonight. Mithras Acolyte - The player will be unable to be healed for the night. Mithras Cult Leader - The player will be framed. Mithras Devout King - The player will be bled sometime during the next day.
---
># [color=orangered]The Mithras Invoker[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=orangered]**Cult Offensive**[/color] **Fanatic (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and target changing. **Bewilder (Day)** - Target player is occupied for this day. - 1 Use **Strings of Mithras (Night)** - Control a player into targeting another. You will only be seen visiting the controlled player. - 1 use >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
-----------
># [color=orangered]The Mithras Ritualist[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=orangered]**Cult Support**[/color] **Will of Mithras (Day)** - Make a Cult Member appear as selected BD class to investigations this night. - 1 use **Strength Of Mithras (Night)** - The Cult Leader's Blood of Mithras will bypass night immunity tonight. - 1 use >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
-------
># [color=orangered]The Mithras Seeker[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=orangered]**Cult Investigative**[/color] **Expose (Day)** - Reveal who the prince jailed at the start of the night. - 1 use **Gaze (Night)** - Learn a player's class type. - 2 uses >_Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and the Corax Cult._
[/details]
#### Blue Dragon Win Condition:
>_Your objective is to defeat the Corax and Mithras Cults._
---
## Playerlist 1. ~~Marshal~~ - Died Night 3 - [color=solblue]**The Prince**[/color] 2. ~~SoulShade55r~~ - Lynched Day 6 - [color=crimson]**The Corax Cult Leader**[/color] 3. ~~Alice~~ - Lynched Day 3 - [color=orangered]**The Mithras Seeker**[/color] 4. ~~Datbird~~ - Died Night 2 - [color=solblue]**The Maid**[/color] 5. ~~JakeTheWolfie~~ - Lynched Day 2 - [color=solblue]**The Knight**[/color] 6. ~~Kai_5~~ - Lynched Day 5 - [color=solblue]**The Hunter**[/color] 7. ~~Napoleon~~ ~~Insanity~~ Maxwell - [color=red]**MODKILLED**[/color] Night 4 - [color=orangered]**The Mithras Cult Leader**[/color] 8. Arete 9. ~~Luxy~~ - Died Day 6 - [color=crimson]**The Corax Cult Leader**[/color] 10. ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ - Lynched Day 4 - [color=orangered]**The Mithras Ritualist**[/color] 11. ~~Sulit~~ - Died Night 1 - [color=solblue]**The Physician**[/color] 12. ~~KyoDaz~~ - Died Night 1 - [color=solblue]**The Knight**[/color] 13. ~~Italy~~ - Died Night 5 - [color=crimson]**The Corax Seeker**[/color] 14. ~~WazzaAzza~~ - Died Night 4 - [color=solblue]**The Physician**[/color] 15. Jgoesgaming 16. ~~Vulgard~~ - Died Night 5 - [color=solblue]**The Physician**[/color] 17. Centuries :crown: 18. Teleology 19. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ - Died Night 1 - [color=solblue]**The Noble**[/color] :ghost: 20. ~~Magnus~~ - Died Night 6 - [color=solblue]**The Hunter**[/color] 21. ~~OzzKozz~~ - Lynched Day 6 - [color=solblue]**The Paladin**[/color] 22. H_Hja

item.title: [SFoL] 52 Clash Of Cults - The Blue Dragon are Victorious!
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
You are correct on your guesses that I am together with myself (later Wazza) and Soul at D1.

The simple reasons give me impression that you are hiding something than you let on, Wazza and Soul understands my reasoning that you are Paladin, saying their fake actions on strongest townread give them credit of the team just as I intended to make it so.

Lemme check the spreadsheet, but I have a feeling Corax failed the moment Wazza commit suicide, it has to be act of deception coming from Hja I think? Archer claiming Hunter putting bleed on him, I believe that was the idea that Wazza fell for it?

Read full topic
